Class Commands

  • java.lang.Object
    • state_machine.Commands

  • public class Commands
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines static methods for each available command

        Parameters:
        current - The current state
        io - The state machine I/O handler
        player - The player
        deck - The deck of cards
        strategy - The employed strategy
        stats - The game statistics
        score - The score class for evaluating hands and respective pay-outs
        Returns:
        The resulting state after performing the given command
